embed.title: Cerberus Tips
embed.description: Tips on Cerberus Honor Hunting formation.

fields.name: Tips
fields.value:
• Use 2 Pilgrims (3 if they are level-8).
• Use 3 Brawlers (4 if they are level-8).
• Use as many Voodoo Dolls as you can.
• Use 1 or 2 Pumpkin Guard units (to lower Cerberus's defense).
• Use as many level-9 Necromancer as you can.
• Use as many level-9 Taurus Witchers as you can.
• Use 1 or 2 Nun units.
• Use level-9 Peltasts as filler troops.
• Use level-9 Ghost Assassins as filler troops. Put them at the back row(s).
• Use level-9 Undead Soldier as filler troops.

fields.name: Stages
fields.value:
• Stage 1: day 1-2
• Stage 2: day 3-4
• Stage 3: day 5-7
